::: {.cell}

:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
selects2023 <- read_sav("C:/Users/Celal/OneDrive/Bureau/celalguney/posts/selects2023/selects2023_recoded.sav")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
selects2023$gender <- factor(as_label(selects2023$sex))
selects2023$age_cat <- factor(as_label(selects2023$age_cat))
selects2023$class <- factor(as_label(selects2023$class8))
selects2023$education <- relevel(factor(as_label(selects2023$education_recoded)), ref = "Secondary")
selects2023$class <- relevel(selects2023$class, ref = "Production workers")
selects2023$lang <- factor(as_label(selects2023$Language))

glmer <- glmer(data = selects2023,
              TaxesHighIncDummy ~ IncomeDecile + class + education + lang + (1|Canton),
              family = binomial)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
boundary (singular) fit: see help('isSingular')
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(glmer)
```
